段: 我傳道E5試煉
Goa2 Thoan5-to7 E5 Chhi3-lian7
Ti7神學teh beh卒業e5一早起，ti7便所teh想：今beh出學去傳道，也到底會傳偌久？有thang toa3幾位教會做工？
Ti7 Sin5-hak8 teh beh chut-giap8 e5 chit8 cha2-khi2, ti7 pian7-sou2 teh siuN7: TaN beh chhut oh8 khi3 thoan5-to7, ia7 tau3-te2 e7 thoan5 loa7 ku2? U7 thang toa3 kui2 ui7 kau3-hoe7 cho3-kang?
若傳三幾年久，toa3一半位教會；是無采父母e5艱苦生育！Kap扑損濟濟先生e5勞心教育！！以及家己日暝e5空空苦工學問！！！

Na7 thoan5 saN kui2 ni5 ku2, toa3 chit8-poaN3 ui7 kau3-hoe7; si7 bo5 chhai2 pe7-bo2 e5 kan-khou2 seng-iok8! Kap phah-sng2 che7-che7 sian-seN e5 lo5-sim kau3-iok8!! I2-kip8 ka-ti7 jit8-me5 e5 khang-khang khou2-kang hak8-bun7 !!!
設使若傳真久，toa3濟濟位教會；又驚了傳道變傳肚：親像俗語講，「童乩做久，會變精！老大做久，會食錢！！！」

Siat-su2 na7 thoan5 chin ku2, toa3 che7-che7 ui7 kau3-hoe7; iu7 kiaN-liau2 thoan5-to7 piN3 thoan5-tou7: chhin-chhiuN7 siok8-gu2 kong2, “Tang5-ki cho3 ku2, e7 piN3 chiN! Lau7-toa7 cho3 ku2, e7 chiah8 chiN5 !!!”
若天父hou7我ti7世間，mai3長mai3短活teh十年久；賞賜我會到逐所在出力做主e5工！m7 kai3好！！！
Na7 ThiN-pe7 hou7 goa2 ti7 se3-kan, mai3 tng5 mai3 te2 oah8 teh chap8 ni5 ku2; siuN2-su3 goa2 e7 kau3 tak8 sou2-chai7 chhut-lat8 cho3 Chu2 e5 kang! m7 kai3 ho2 !!!
了後我就招前年去恆春傳道e5同工，陳朝明窗友，去稟教士會，請阮2人beh做陣賣冊兼佈道：教士會準。

Liau2-au7 goa2 chiu7 chio cheng5 ni5 khi3 Heng5-chhun thoan5-to7 e5 tang5-kang, Tan5 Tiau5-beng5 chhong-iu2, khi3 pin2 Kau3-su7-hoe7, chheng2 goan2 2 lang5 beh cho3-tin7 be7-chheh kiam pou3-to7: Kau3-su7-hoe7 chun2.
1、北港傳道：阮2人去北港起工：代先ti7沿海佈道；有一暝，一個人聽了，受感動講，「若夠有這號e5上帝，我的確beh拜！」

1. Pak-kang2 Thoan5-to7: Goan2 2 lang5 khi3 Pak-kang2 khi2-kang: tai7-seng ti7 ian5-hai2 pou3-to7; u7 chit8 me5, chit8 e5 lang5 thiaN liau2, siu7 kam2-tong7 kong2, “Na7 kau3 u7 chit ho7 e5 Siong7-te3, goa2 tek-khak beh pai3!”

路尾暗，我ti7北港街面，賣福音傳佈道：代先有店頭e5人ka7我講，「北港媽m7-thang講！以外做你講，無要緊！！！」我直直賣tui3市場內，做猴戲e5棚邊去，ti7 hia teh講e5時，濟濟人ka7我包圍--leh；有一個講是三界頭，頭鬃尾纏ti7頷頸--nih8，kap眾人tui3我大攻擊；總是聽眾受氣歹嘴，也我歡喜好嘴：我hit暝連連hou7眾人圍3遍；總是3站，攏得著無事解圍：俗語講，「惡拳無扑笑面！」抑是講，「溫柔會煞人e5受氣！」

Lou7-boe2 am3, goa2 ti7 Pak-kang2 ke-bin7, be7 Hok-im-toan7 pou3-to7: tai7-seng u7 tiam3-thau5 e5 lang5 ka7 goa2 kong2,“Pak-kang2-ma2 m7-thang kong2! I2-goa7 cho3 li2 kong2, bo5 iau3-kin2 !!!” Goa2 tit8-tit8 be7 tui3 chhi7-tiuN5-lai7, cho3 kau5-hi3 e5 peN5-piN khi3, ti7 hia teh kong2 e5 si5, che7-che7 lang5 ka7 goa2 pau-ui5--leh; u7 chit8 e5 kong2 si7 Sam-kai3-thau5, thau5-chang-boe2 tiN5 ti7 am7-kun2--nih8, kap cheng3-lang5 tui3 goa2 toa7 kong-kek; chong2-si7 theng3-chiong3 siu7-khi3 phaiN2-chhui3, ia7 goa2 hoaN-hi2 ho2-chhui3: goa2 hit me5 lian5-lian5 hou7 cheng3 lang5 ui5 3 pian3; chong2-si7 3 cham7, long2 tit tioh8 bo5 su7 kai2-ui5: siok8-gu2 kong2, “Ok-kun5 bo5 phah chhio3-bin7!” a2 si7 kong2, “Un-jiu5 e7 soah lang5 e5 siu7-khi3!”
Hit暝孤軍奮鬥！靠主過了一生最大e5 窘逐！！歡喜好睏！！！
Hit me5 kou-kun hun3-tou3! Kho3 Chu2 koe3 liau2 it-seng choe3-toa7 e5 khun2-tiok8!! hoaN-hi2 ho2-khun3 !!!
2、澎湖傳道：我續chhoa7家後做伙去馬公。Hia e5主任傳道chhoa7阮去西嶼廟nih8佈道：伊e5開會詞講，「日本原來是進貢咱中原；到基督教傳去，in得著西法強起來，才會thai5贏清朝，來佔咱台灣！」廟內一個kiah8長薰炊e5老人，聽了爬起來講，「An2-ne基督教是惡教！ai3霸佔人e5土地！！！」

2. PheN5-ou5 Thoan5-to7: Goa2 soa3 chhoa7 ke-au7 cho3-hoe2 khi3 Ma2-keng. Hia e5 chu2-jim7 thoan5-to7 chhoa7 goan2 khi3 Sai-su7 bio7--nih8 pou3-to7: I e5 khai-hoe7-su5 kong2, “Jit8-pun2 goan5-lai5 si7 chin3-kong3 lan2 Tiong-goan5; kau3 Ki-tok-kau3 thoan5 khi3, in tit tioh8 se-hoat kiong5--khi2-lai5, chiah e7 thai5-iaN5 Chheng-tiau5, lai5 chiam3 lan2 Tai5-oan5!” Bio7-lai7 chit8 e5 kiah8 tng5-hun-chhoe e5 lau7-lang5, thiaN liau2 peh khi2 lai5 kong2, “An2-ne Ki-tok-kau3 si7 ok-kau3! ai3 pa3-chiam3 lang5 e5 thou2-te7 !!!”
三個傳道就收兵，掛免戰牌回營：Che是我一生所tu2著最大e5失敗！！！
SaN e5 thoan5-to7 chiu7 siu-peng, koa3 bian2-chian3-pai5 hoe5 iaN5: Che si7 goa2 it-seng sou2 tu2 tioh8 choe3 toa7 e5 sit-pai7 !!!
後來我chhoa7家後去頂山教會工作。
Au7-lai5 goa2 chhoa7 ke-au7 khi3 Teng2-soaN kau3-hoe7 kang-chok.
3、農嬌傳道：了後我chhoa7家後去枋寮、佳祿堂、枋山等地方，賣冊、佈道，chhoa7禮拜。
3.Long5-kiau Thoan5-to7: Liau2-au7 goa2 chhoa7 ke-au7 khi3 Pang-liau5, Ka-lok8-tong5, Pang-soaN teng2 te7-hng, be7 chheh, pou3-to7, chhoa7 le2-pai3.
4、阮翁某著瘟疫：不幸阮兩人攏染著天狗熱；不得已beh走去敝岳父e5所在逃生。
4.Goan2 ang-bou2 tioh8 un-ek8: Put-heng7 goan2 nng7 lang5 long2 jiam2 tioh8 thian-kau2-jiat8; put-tek-i2 beh chau2 khi3 pe3 gak8-hu7 e5 sou2-chai7 to5-seN.
Tui3台南經過，續去新樓beh tui3教士會領過了e5月給：會計講，「傳道局攏總chhun 五六百箍na7-tiaN7，無夠thang發傳道薪金；若hou7你領，無hou7別人領，是無公道！！！」

Tui3 Tai5-lam5 keng-koe3, soa3 khi3 Sin-lau5 beh tui3 Kau3-su7-hoe7 nia2 koe3 liau2 e5 goeh8-kip: Koe3-ke3 kong2,“Thoan5-to7-kiok8 long2-chong2 chhun gou7-lak8-pah khou na7-tiaN7, bo5 kau3 thang hoat thoan5-to7 sin-kim; na7 hou7 li2 nia2,bo5 hou7 pat8-lang5 nia2, si7 bo5 kong-to7 !!!”
兩人就koh坐車走去小天堂；到位，兩翁某攏熱到不知天地；婦人人e5熱代先退；我病真久，be7落眠床腳。

Nng7 lang5 chiu7 koh che7 chhia chau2 khi3 Sio2-thian-tong5; kau3-ui7, nng7 ang-bou2 long2 jiat8 kau3 put-ti thian-te7: hu7-jin5-lang5 e5 jiat8 tai7-seng the3: goa2 peN7 chin ku2, be7 loh8 bin5-chhng5-kha.
後來得著敝岳母tim7小補ka7我thiaN7，才會行到埕--nih8；心肝真歡喜！親像重出世！！！
Au7-lai5 tit tioh8 pe3 gak8-bo2 tim7 sio2-pou2 ka7 goa2 thiaN7, chiah e7 kiaN5 kau3 tiaN5--nih8; sim-koaN chin hoaN-hi2! Chhin-chhiuN7 teng5 chhut-si3 !!!
我e5身軀小可有元氣，就褪赤腳、ha5腳巾、戴笠仔，khaiN鋤頭畚箕，去拾牛傍poe2塗豆，挽菜豆，kap做逐款e5工。

Goa2 e5 seng-khu sio2-khoa2 u7 goan5-khi3, chiu7 thng3 chhiah-kha, ha5 kha-kin, ti3 leh8-a2, khaiN ti5-thau5 pun3-ki, khi3 khioh gu5-png3 poe2 thou5-tau7, ban2 chhai3-tau7, kap cho3 tak8 khoan2 e5 kang.
對面e5小學校女教員來探--我；伊是原台北組合教會e5女傳道。伊ka7我講，in e5校長真感心--我！講世上e5讀冊人，m7肯行我hit款e5路！！！續提一本山田寅之助著e5基督傳送--我，hit本冊比舊底白話新舊約iau2較大本；材料真濟！真新！！真好！！！

Tui3-bin7 e5 sio2-hak8-hau7 lu2 kau3-oan5 lai5 tham3--goa2; i si7 goan5 Tai5-pak Chou-hap8 kau3-hoe7 e5 lu2 thoan5-to7. I ka7 goa2 kong2, in e5 hau7-tiuN2 chin kam2-sim--goa2! Kong2 se3-chiuN7 e5 thak8-chheh lang5, m7 kheng2 kiaN5 goa2 hit khoan2 e5 lou7 !!! Soa3 theh8 chit8 pun2 San-tian5 In5-chi-chou7 tu3 e5 Ki-tok-toan7 sang3--goa2, hit pun2 chheh pi2 ku7-te2 peh8-oe7 Sin-ku7-iok iau2 khah toa7 pun2; chhai5-liau7 chin che7! Chin sin !! Chin ho2 !!!
5、我信心脫線：我e5身體較勇e5時，有一日接著教士會會計e5批，叫我通知住所，伊beh寄薪水hou7--我。
5. Goa2 sin3-sim thoat-soaN3: Goa2 e5 sin-the2 khah iong2 e5 si5, u7 chit8 jit8 chiap tioh8 Kau3-su7-hoe7 Koe3-ke3 e5 phoe, kio3 goa2 thong-ti chu7-sou2, i beh kia3 sin-sui2 hou7--goa2.
Hit時我teh想，這個無法無天不近人情e5人！翁某e5月給11箍；兩人著重病，無一粒米，無一滴鹽，無一支柴；月尾錢iau2無thang領；薪金連連ka7阮曠幾若月日久！若等你寄錢來生活！我無病死，也餓死！扑算肉爛了，骨也四散lah！今道著傳！錢也著趁！！！

Hit si5 goa2 teh siuN7, chit e5 bu5-hoat bu5-thian put-kin7 jin5-cheng5 e5 lang5! Ang-bou2 e5 goeh8-kip 11 khou; nng7 lang5 tioh8 tang7-piN7, bo5 chit8 liap8 bi2, bo5 chit8 tih iam5, bo5 chit8 ki chha5; goeh8-boe2-chiN5 iau2 bo5 thang nia2; sin-kim lian5-lian5 ka7 goan2 khong3 kui2-na7 goeh8-jit8 ku2! Na7 tan2 li2 kia3 chiN5 lai5 seN-oah8! Goa2 bo5 peN7 si2, ia7 go7-si2! phah-sng3 bah noa7 liau2, kut ia7 si3-soaN3 lah! TaN To7 tioh8 thoan5! ChiN5 ia7 tioh8 than3 !!!
到勇健e5時，koh ti7中部e5坑口、南投等地方工作；總是心肝服事2個主人！
Kau3 iong2-kiaN7 e5 si5, koh ti7 tiong-pou7 e5 KheN-khau2, Lam5-tau5 teng2 te7-hng kang-chok; chong2-si7 sim-koaN hok8-sai7 2 e5 chu2-lang5!
6、我e5信心復活。Hit年e5 12月尾，接著巴博士e5批，講一間最老e5教會，起新拜堂了，有加幾若戶新聽--e5，可惜hia e5傳道續過往去！教士會ai3派我去接任：續叫我著趁新曆過年，火車落價e5時赴任！也願主贊我去hia大興起伊e5聖會！！！

6. Goa2 e5 sin3-sim koh-oah8. Hit ni5 e5 12 goeh8-boe2,chiap tioh8 Pa phok-su7 e5 phoe, kong2 chit8 keng choe3 lau7 e5 kau3-hoe7, khi2 sin pai3-tng5 liau2, u7 ke kui2-na7 hou7 sin-thiaN--e5, kho2-sioh hia e5 thoan5-to7 soa3 koe3-ong2 khi3! Kau3-su7-hoe7 ai3 phai3 goa2 khi3 chiap-jim7: soa3 kio3 goa2 tioh8 than3 sin-lek8 koe3-ni5, hoe2-chhia loh8-ke3 e5 si5 hu3-jim7! Ia7 goan7 Chu2 chan7 goa2 khi3 hia toa7 heng-khi2 I e5 Seng3-hoe7 !!!
阮趁命令赴任。到位hit暗，聽吳傳道娘（雞母嬸--仔）e5信仰經驗談：講in一生toa3教會，逐擺若「飼豬厭垢，in柴落草」；chhun幾百--銀-仔，就著病歹運去醫館開了了！後來ti7路中，柴拾ti7手--nih8；想著主若m7是賜福，計謀是空空；就koh將柴hiat-kak8。Ti7這個尾站，專心做主e5工；到這幫查甫人來明白，iau2 chhun六百箍！

Goan2 than3 beng7-leng7 hu3-jim7. Kau3-ui7 hit am3, thiaN Gou5 thoan5-to7-niu5 (Ke-bo2-chim2--a2) e5 sin3-giong2 keng-giam7-tam5: kong2 in it-seng toa3 kau3-hoe7, tak8-pai2 na7“chhi7-ti iam3-kau2, in-chha5 lak-chhau2”; chhun kui2 pah gin5-a2, chiu7 tioh8-peN7 phaiN2-un7 khi3 i-koan2 khai liau2-liau2! Au7-lai5 ti7 lou7-tiong, chha5 khioh ti7 chhiu2--nih8; siuN7 tioh8 Chu2 na7 m7 si7 su3-hok, ke3-bou5 si7 khang-khang; chiu7 koh chiong chha5 hiat-kak8. Ti7 chit e5 boe2-cham7, choan-sim cho3 Chu2 e5 kang; kau3 chit-pang cha-pou-lang5 lai5 beng5-pek8, iau2 chhun lak8-pah khou!
我聽了，信心復活！！！Teh想我信主e5時，已經kap主同死；舊底e5我，已經無去！現今kap主同活；是主tiam3 ti7我teh活！將來beh kap主永遠同齊天；一日一百外錢，kap三幾十銀較慢提，無問題！！！

Goa2 thiaN liau2, sin3-sim koh-oah8 !!! Teh siuN7 goa2 sin3 Chu2 e5 si5, i2-keng kap Chu2 tang5 si2; ku7-te2 e5 goa2, i2-keng bo5 khi3! Hian7-kim kap Chu2 tang5-oah8; si7 Chu2 tiam3 ti7 goa2 teh oah8! Chiong-lai5 beh kap Chu2 eng2-oan2 tang5 che5 thiN; chit8 jit8 chit8-pah goa7 chiN5, kap saN-kui2-chap8 gin5 khah ban7 theh8, bo5 bun7-te5 !!!
(khiam3 1958 ni5 2-3 geh8)
我去日本宗教見學
Goa2 Khi3 Jit8-pun2 Chong-kau3 Kian3-hak8
1、稟報恩師kap恩人：我寫批去hou7校長巴博士看；續請伊，替轉寄hou7梅牧師。後來梅博士ti7英國，回批來講：論你所寫e5事，是真難打算；總是我求上帝chhoa7你所著行e5路！

1. Pin2-po3 in-su kap in-jin5: Goa2 sia2 phoe khi3 hou7 hau7-tiuN2 Pa Phok-su7 khoaN3; soa3 chhiaN2 i, the3 choan2 kia3 hou7 Mui5 Bok8-su. Au7-lai5 Mui5 Phok-su7 ti7 Eng-kok, hoe5 phoe lai5 kong2: Lun7 li2 sou2 sia2 e5 su7, si7 chin oh phah-sng3; chong2-si7 goa2 kiu5 Siong7-te3 chhoa7 li2 sou2 tioh8 kiaN5 e5 lou7!

2、稟請教士會：巴博士去巡教會，續受託kap我打合3暝昏，暗頭是會教會公e5代誌，更深攏參詳我去日本e5私事：巴博士講，你be7曉日本話，去日本無路用！我應講，我be7曉日本話，去日本較快bat！巴博士講，我m7敢錢贊--你；因為前贊學生去日本讀冊，人攏反對，講會害伊去犯罪！！！後來真正有影！！人嫌我講，ka7你講，你to7 m7聽honn3！！！了錢，續hou7人嫌！我今m7敢！！！我講，我m7免hou7你幫贊！巴博士講，M7-ku2你若ti7日本，破病無所費；人會嫌--阮，an2-choaN2准你去？！

2. Pin2-chheng2 Kau3-su7-hoe7: Pa Phok-su7 khi3 sun5 kau3-hoe7, soa3 siu7-thok kap goa2 taN2-hap8 3 me5-hng, am3-thau5 si7 hoe7 kau3-hoe7 kong e5 tai7-chi3, keN-chhim long2 chham-siang5 goa2 khi3 Jit8-pun2 e5 su-su7: Pa Phok-su7 kong2, Li2 be7-hiau2 Jit8-pun2 oe7, khi3 Jit8-pun2 bo5 lou7-eng7! Goa2 in3 kong2, Goa2 be7-hiau2 Jit8-pun2 oe7, khi3 Jit8-pun2 khah khoai3 bat! Pa Phok-su7 kong2, Goa2 m7 kaN2 chiN5 chan7--li2; in-ui7 cheng5 chan7 hak8-seng khi3 Jit8-pun2 thak8-chheh, lang5 long2 hoan2-tui3, kong2 e7 hai7 i khi3 hoan7-choe7!!! Au7-lai5 chin-chiaN3 u7 iaN2!! Lang5 hiam5 goa2 kong2, ka7 li2 kong2, li2 to7 m7 thiaN honn3!!! Liau2 chiN5, soa3 hou7 lang5 hiam5! goa2 taN m7 kaN2 !!! Goa2 kong2, Goa2 m7 bian2 hou7 li2 pang-chan7! Pa Phok-su7 kong2, M7-ku2 li2 na7 ti7 Jit8-pun2, phoa3-peN7 bo5 sou2-hui3; lang5 e7 hiam5--goan2, an2-choaN2 chun2 li2 khi3?!
我講，我kap拙內e5 sai-khia錢，攏總e5財產85箍，已經ti7總督府現在科證明了！去到日本to2位e5郵便局都會領--tit！！！

Goa2 kong2, Goa2 kap choat-loe7 e5 sai-khia chiN5, long2-chong2 e5 chai5-san2 85 khou, i2-keng ti7 Chong2-tok-hu2 hian7-chai7-kho cheng3-beng5 liau2! Khi3 kau3 Jit8-pun2 to2-ui7 e5 iu5-pian7-kiok8 to e7 nia2--tit !!!
3暝昏較講都be7解決。後來2人beh去岡山赴傳教師會，我ti7車中tui3身軀提一張名刺寫講，一年久教士會mai3 ka7我派工，也我無ka7教會領薪水；我拋妻離子，傾家動產，若無較有利益教會，我的確無ai3 koh繼續；設使教會若較有利益，lin2穩當會贊成，hou7我自由。

3 me5-hng khah kong2 to be7 kai2-koat. Au7-lai5 2 lang5 beh khi3 Kong-san hu3 Thoan5-kau3-su-hoe7, goa2 ti7 chhia-tiong tui3 seng-khu theh8 chit8 tiuN beng5-chhi3 sia2 kong2, chit8 ni5 ku2 Kau3-su7-hoe7 mai3 ka7 goa2 phai3-kang, ia7 goa2 bo5 ka7 Kau3-hoe7 nia2 sin-sui2; goa2 pha-chhe li7-chu2, kheng-ka tong7-san2, na7 bo5 khah u7 li7-ek kau3-hoe7, goa2 tek-khak bo5 ai3 koh ke3-siok8; siat-su2 kau3-hoe7 na7 khah u7 li7-ek, lin2 un2-tang3 e7 chan3-seng5, hou7 goa2 chu7-iu5.
後來教士會通過，續ti7台中報告南部中會；中會接納了，有一個本地元老牧師企起來講，限一年，是有路beh去路，無路chiah beh轉來chhoe7主顧！！！

Au7-lai5 Kau3-su7-hoe7 thong-koe3, soa3 ti7 Tai5-tiong po3-ko3 Lam5-pou7 Tiong-hoe7; Tiong-hoe7 chiap-lap8 liau2, u7 chit8 e5 pun2-te7 goan5-lo2 bok8-su khia7 khi2 lai5 kong2, Han7 chit8 ni5, si7 u7 lou7 beh khi3 lou7, bo5 lou7 chiah beh tng2 lai5 chhoe7 chu2-kou3 !!!
中會煞，南路e5代議長老，ti7我toa3 e5所在落車；知影我e5事情，大家得著安慰。
Tiong-hoe7 soah, Lam5-lou7 e5 tai7-gi7 tiuN2-lo2, ti7 goa2 toa3 e5 sou2-chai7 loh8-chhia; chai-iaN2 goa2 e5 su7-cheng5, tai7-ke tit tioh8 an-ui3.
3、西教士大反對：教士會e5會計，寫批叫我到台南著落車，去ka7伊提移轉費。我後來到台南e5時，是tui3新樓後門入--去，tu2好有西教士一個男kap 2個女，teh講話。我ka7 in請安。Hia e5老女--e5歹聲嗽，問我ti7時beh去日本？我應，五月初beh去！伊就tui3 hit個少年女e5手，khaiN2 teh走！

3. Se-kau3-su7 toa7 hoan2-tui3: Kau3-su7-hoe7 e5 Koe3-ke3, sia2 phoe kio3 goa2 kau3 Tai5-lam5 tioh8 loh8-chhia, khi3 ka7 i theh8 i5-choan2-hui3. Goa2 au7-lai5 kau3 Tai5-lam5 e5 si5, si7 tui3 Sin-lau5 au7-mng5 jip8--khi3, tu2-ho2 u7 Se-kau3-su7 chit8 e5 lam5 kap 2 e5 lu2, teh kong2-oe7. Goa2 ka7 in chheng2-an. Hia e5 lau7 lu2--e5 phaiN2 siaN-sau3, mng7 goa2 ti7-si5 beh khi3 Jit8-pun2? Goa2 in3, Gou7-goeh8 chhe beh khi3! I chiu7 tui3 hit e5 siau3-lian5 lu2 e5 chhiu2, khaiN2 teh chau2!
Hit暗去chhoe7會計恩師，見著面受氣直直嫌。我應，俗語講，「有樣看樣！無樣看世上！」抑是講，「一百擺聽！m7值著一擺看！」以及「經一事，長一智！」傳道人m7是童乩！若童乩是「十童九陰！」騙憨人，講無人bat--e5！

Hit am3 khi3 chhoe7 Koe3-ke3 in-su, kiN3 tioh8 bin7 siu7-khi3 tit8-tit8 hiam5. Goa2 in3, Siok8-gu2 kong2, “U7 iuN7 khoaN3 iuN7! Bo5 iuN7 khoaN3 se3-chiuN7!” a2 si7 kong2, “Chit8 pah-pai2 thiaN! m7 tat8 tioh8 chit8 pai2 khoaN3!” i2-kip8 “Keng it su7, tiong2 it ti3!” Thoan5-to7 lang5 m7 si7 tang5-ki! Na7 tang5-ki si7 “Chap8 tang5 Kau2 im!” phian3 gong7-lang5, kong2 bo5 lang5 bat--e5!
Lin2來台灣e5西教士，攏是學士、碩士、博士了了；冊是大櫥細櫥，下到歸內面，世界不時親像行灶腳；toa3 ti7新樓內角那親像ti7三層天，hou7人侵犯be7著，道理一年講無幾篇！材料用無路！！！

Lin2 lai5 Tai5-oan5 e5 Se-kau3-su7, long2 si7 hak8-su7, sek-su7, phok-su7 liau2-liau2; chheh si7 toa7-tu5 se3-tu5, he7 kau3 kui lai7-bin7, se3-kai3 put-si5 chhin-chhiuN7 kiaN5 chau3-kha; toa3 ti7 sin-lau5 lai7-kak na2 chhin-chhiuN7 ti7 saN chan3 thiN, hou7 lang5 chhim-hoan7 be7 tioh8, to7-li2 chit8 ni5 kong2 bo5 kui2 phiN! Chhai5-liau7 eng7 bo5 lou7 !!!

若是我！！！小學讀年外！中學讀一年較足！！大學讀3年半！！！若beh做佈道家，一篇可以講通台灣！若是做奮興家，幾篇可以遊世界！！！總是做顧堂、企堂，兼傳道e5人；日暝所tu2--著-e5，是「軍官民」「九流三教」，男婦老幼，新舊智識，勇lam2 kap好歹人！！！道理一年著講幾百篇；若親像我這款甕底無豆菜，所有e5冊都擔無一擔！早是「孤行獨市！」「關門賣thai2-ko藥！」罔渡，現今文明日進！民智大開！我這款井底水蛙，beh an2-choaN2應世？！Teh想無thang遊世界，至少著到日本；親像水蛙爬上井頂，來看一個天偌大！

Na7 si7 goa2 !!! Sio2-oh8 thak8 ni5-goa7! Tiong-oh8 thak8 chit8 ni5 khah chiok!! Toa7-oh8 thak8 3 ni5-poaN3 !!! Na7 beh cho3 pou3-to7-ka, chit8 phiN kho2-i2 kong2 thong Tai5-oan5! Na7 si7 cho3 hun3-heng-ka, kui2 phiN kho2-i2 iu5 se3-kai3 !!! Chong2-si7 cho3 kou3-tng5, khia7-tng5, kiam thoan5-to7 e5 lang5; jit8-me5 sou2 tu2--tioh8-e5, si7 `kun koaN bin5' “Kiu2-liu5 sam-kau3”,lam5-hu7 lo2-iu3, sin-ku7 ti3-sek, iong2-lam2 kap ho2-phaiN2 lang5!!! To7-li2 chit8 ni5 tioh8 kong2 kui2 pah phiN; na7 chhin-chhiuN7 goa2 chit khoan2 ang3-te2 bo5 tau7-chhai3, sou2 u7 e5 chheh to taN bo5 chit8 taN3! Cha2 si7 “Kou-hang5 tok8-chhi7!” “KoaiN-mng5 be7 thai2-ko-ioh8!” bong2 tou7, hian7-kim bun5-beng5 jit8 chin3! Bin5-ti3 toa7 khui! Goa2 chit khoan2 cheN2-te2 chui2-ke, beh an2-choaN2 eng3-se3?! Teh siuN7 bo5 thang iu5 se3-kai3, chi3-chio2 tioh8 kau3 Jit8-pun2; chhin-chhiuN7 chui2-ke peh chiuN7 cheN2-teng2, lai5 khoaN3 chit8 e5 thiN loa7 toa7!
這個事已經決定了，元老toa3中會ka7我下「虎頭鍘」！老姑娘toa3半路ka7我藐視！E5昏老先生見面直排斥！An2-ne kiam2有合理？

Chit e5 su7 i2-keng koat-teng7 liau2, goan5-lo2 toa3 Tiong-hoe7 ka7 goa2 he7 `hou2-thau5-chah8'! Lau7 kou-niu5 toa3 poaN3-lou7 ka7 goa2 biau2-si7! E5-hng lau7 sian-siN kiN3-bin7 tit8 pai5-thek! An2-ne kiam2 u7 hap8-li2?
老師講，我所疼--e5，攏無ai3 hou7伊去日本！若我所怨--e5，ai3 hou7伊去犯罪--e5，chiah ai3 hou7伊去日本！！！我講，若an2-ne母會派人來台灣，攏先去日本2年久；he m7先去犯犯chiah來！也lin2逐年歇熱，攏chhoa7去日本！也攏去日本teh犯罪！

Lau7-su kong2, goa2 sou2 thiaN3--e5, long2 bo5 ai3 hou7 i khi3 Jit8-pun2! Na7 goa2 sou2 oan3--e5, ai3 hou7 i khi3 hoan7-choe7--e5, chiah ai3 hou7 i khi3 Jit8-pun2!!! Goa2 kong2, Na7 an2-ne Bo2-hoe7 phai3 lang5 lai5 Tai5-oan5, long2 seng khi3 Jit8-pun2 2 ni5 ku2; he m7 seng khi3 hoan7-hoan7 chiah lai5! Ia7 lin2 tak8-ni5 hioh-joah8, long2 chhoa7 khi3 Jit8-pun2! Ia7 long2 khi3 Jit8-pun2 teh hoan7-choe7!
聖冊kiam2 m7是講，「重頭生e5人無犯罪；因為上帝e5種長長tiam3 ti7伊；伊也be7犯罪！」
Seng3-chheh kiam2 m7 si7 kong2, “Teng5-thau5-seN e5 lang5 bo5 hoan7-choe7; in-ui7 Siong7-te3 e5 cheng2 tng5-tng5 tiam3 ti7 i; i ia7 be7 hoan7-choe7!”
無重頭生e5人，toa3 to2位都有罪thang犯！無重頭生e5人，無資格thang做傳道；因為所傳是無重頭生e5道理；會犯罪e5人，是teh傳犯罪e5種；hit款人寧可緊緊hou7伊去日本犯罪！m7 thang留--teh害台灣教會！！！

Bo5 teng5-thau5-seN e5 lang5, toa3 to2-ui7 to u7 choe7 thang hoan7! Bo5 teng5-thau5-seN e5 lang5, bo5 chu-keh thang cho3 thoan5-to7; in-ui7 sou2 thoan5 si7 bo5 teng5-thau5-seN e5 to7-li2; e7 hoan7-choe7 e5 lang5, si7 teh thoan5 hoan7-choe7 e5 cheng2; hit khoan2 lang5 leng5-khou2 kin2-kin2 hou7 i khi3 Jit8-pun2 hoan7-choe7! m7 thang lau5--teh hai7 Tai5-oan5 Kau3-hoe7 !!!
Koh見若去日本就攏犯罪，就咱台灣現時濟濟信徒，出外ti7 hia，beh an2-choaN2？也hia有幾十萬e5日本基督徒，kap幾千個西教士ti7 hia，koh beh an2-choaN2？

Koh kiN3-na7 khi3 Jit8-pun2 chiu7 long2 hoan7-choe7, chiu7 lan2 Tai5-oan5 hian7-si5 che7-che7 sin3-tou5, chhut-goa7 ti7 hia, beh an2-choaN2? Ia7 hia u7 kui2 chap8 ban7 e5 Jit8-pun2 Ki-tok-tou5, kap kui2 chheng e5 Se-kau3-su7 ti7 hia, koh beh an2-choaN2?
Hit時老師母捧茶來會講，廖先生m7 thang受氣！Lin2先生真疼--你！Hit-tiap8老師父也接teh講，我tu2仔手術內痔，m7 thang振動；總是聽著你e5聲真歡喜！趕緊tui3樓頂落--來！！m7是歹意思！！！

Hit si5 lau7 su-bo2 phang5-te5 lai5 hoe7 kong2, Liau7 Sian-seN m7 thang siu7-khi3! Lin2 sian-seN chin thiaN3--li2! Hit-tiap8 lau7 su-hu7 ia7 chiap teh kong2, goa2 tu2-a2 chhiu2-sut8 lai7-ti7, m7 thang tin2-tang7; chong2-si7 thiaN tioh8 li2 e5 siaN chin hoaN-hi2! KoaN2-kin2 tui3 lau5-teng2 loh8--lai5!! m7 si7 phaiN2 i3-su3 !!!
我講，著！Lin2是想我mai3去日本，我較有利益！！！也我是想我去日本，教會較有利益！！！今tu2大家攏是想beh利益教會！想法無siang7！！今著等到我去了，兩爿e5是非chiah會分明！！！

Goa2 kong2, Tioh8! Lin2 si7 siuN7 goa2 mai3 khi3 Jit8-pun2, goa2 khah u7 li7-ek!!! Ia7 goa2 si7 siuN7 goa2 khi3 Jit8-pun2, kau3-hoe7 khah u7 li7-ek!!! Kin-tu2 tai7-ke long2 si7 siuN7 beh li7-ek kau3-hoe7! SiuN7-hoat bo5 siang7!! TaN tioh8 tan2 kau3 goa2 khi3 liau2, liong2-peng5 e5 si7-hui chiah e7 hun-beng5 !!!
4、救星到：師兄林茂生學士安慰我講，M7 thang餒志！若是出tui3良心，到尾的確得勝！著ai3做hou7人看！！！俗語講，「Hou3礁chiah來看khah！」聖賢、忠臣、先知、救主；代先攏是艱苦：「士修而謗興！德高而誹來！」無要緊！！！我chhoa7你來去拜候河野牧師（神學校e5教授）！
